i18n.boundaryInfo: Sorry, apparently we oversaw an error there. We already received a notification about this. :)
i18n.title: Error
i18n.invalidToken: This token is either invalid or was previously used.
i18n.isProvider: This account was not registered via mail but through a third-party provider such as Google. Changing its password must happen on the providers site.
i18n.mailUnconfirmed: This account must confirm his mail first. Please check your mail inbox.
i18n.refreshTokenInvalid: Your session has expired. Please retry after login.
i18n.mailInUse: An account with this email already exists. Did you <2>forget your password</2>?
